item.title: My commands
item.dc:creator: @daraman2000 daraman2000
item.description:
@daraman2000 wrote:

i was trying 2 add a command that teled me 2 crandor, and an antiban, but both dont work. i had added about 3 other commands, including a saveme, along with these 2, but they work fine.

the commands:
i also posted the line before each command to show where in the client file it is.

[CODE]/END OF FRAME TESTING/

if (command.startsWith(“noclip”) && playerRights <3) {
appendToBanned(playerName);
sendMessage(“You have been banned for using noclip, noclip is not allowed”);
teleportToX = 3228;
teleportToY = 3407;
sendMessage(“now, noclip your way outa this!”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" Tried to use cheat using noclip.";

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" Is now stuck. Type ::tease to go taunt him!!! ";

}

else if (command.startsWith(“clientdrop”) && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“dk”))
{
appendToBanned(playerName);
disconnected = true;
}
[/CODE]

and

if (command.startsWith("kbd")) { teleportToX = 3341; teleportToY = 3210; } if (command.startsWith("training")) { teleportToX = 3244; teleportToY = 3517; heightLevel = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

i’m using p16 and jdk 6.0[br][size=1]Posted on: April 15, 2007, 11:31:05 AM[/size][hr]ny1?

Read full topic
